function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contamination of hospital environment with SARS-CoV-2 RNA","Impact":"Risk of spreading COVID-19 to patients, medical staff, and visitors","Mitigation":"Regular and thorough disinfection, strict adherence to infection control measures","Technologies":"Advanced disinfection technologies, air purification systems","People":"Patients, medical staff, visitors","Owner":"Hospital management and infection control team"}]}
